long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search YouTube with AI, summarize long videos with high quality, enjoy custom transcription.

Alphy is a complete AI extension for YouTube, streamlining the way you search information and interact with video content. Our tool is integrated with YouTube search, allowing lightning speed information capture from search results. 

No need to process. No need to wait. Alphy will give you what you are looking for instantly.
